help-file.title: "WATER BREATHING"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
This spell causes the victim to sprout gills, allowing him or her to breathe underwater for a limited period of time. Those underwater when the spell wears off will quickly drown. The gills disappear when this spell expires.
